July 30 (Reuters) - AVEVA Group PLC AVV.L:: *AVEVA GROUP PLC - Q1 TRADING UPDATE *AVEVA - AVEVA HAS HAD A GOOD START TO FY22, ACHIEVING APPROXIMATELY 11% REVENUE GROWTH IN FIRST THREE MONTHS
